body:
Weclome to IAY (I ask you) So today are my questions are (grammar is a biha :3) Here: 

1. Tornado or Pickle?
2. Darude or Sandstorm?
3. On a scale of wheat - Potato how good are u at driving?
4. KFC or McDonald?
5. Burger king or Taco Bell?
6. Syria or Ukraine?
7. If you had a Black dog with yellow spots... would u kill him/her?
8. Would u die of Heart attacks?
9. d0 u l13k gR4mm4r?
10. House or Hotel?

More questions tomorrow :3
